snippet.title: $1 return airfares on offer
snippet.content:
FOURTEEN hundred seats to or from Cairns with $1 return airfares are being offered by Tigerair Australia today.
The sale is for travel early next year between late January and late March 2018.
The "Pay to Go, Come Back for $1" sale starts at noon today and ends at noon on Saturday.
Tigerair Australia spokesman Joel Dwyer said the deals were expected to be snapped up fast.
"Gather up your loose change for a return flight from one of Australia's most beautiful destinations, including Cairns, the Whitsundays or the Gold Coast," he said.
Brisbane-Cairns flights with 500 seats are available from $95 one way/$1 return (January 30-March 27), Cairns-Melbourne $135, 400 seats (January 30-March 21) and Cairns-Sydney $139, 500 seats (January 30-March 21).
